channel.title: Forgescape 718+ Come check us!
channel.description:
Hello! I am Forgescape's new moderator Joku69. I wanna tell you something about our server Forgescape.
What is [url=http://www.ForgeScape.com]www.ForgeScape.com[/url]?
At ForgeScape our primary goal is to keep everything as realistic as possible. We offer you an amazing gameplay that you won't forget. That includes that we have fixed many bugs dupes and glitches and if we find a new bug, we try our best to fix it as soon as possible. You can enjoy the RuinNation feeling together with a perfect eco system. Even the minor detail counts if you are coding a minigame or bosses, that's why we offer you perfection!
Features:
- ALL Skills working with many different locations to level up - 100% working Construction - 24/7 VPS hosted - Double XP Friday-Sunday - Amazing Economy - Professional Drop-Rates - Amazing Skilling & Combat - Custom Bosses - Professional/Experienced Staff - Unique combination of PvP, Pvm and PvE gameplay - HD textures Reminder: We have alot more features. Come check them out yourself !!!
Unique Home [img]http://s15.postimg.org/iptkp1417/forgescape6.png[/img]
Nex! [img]http://s24.postimg.org/7ffq2sbvp/forgescape7.png[/img]
Working Construction [img]http://s14.postimg.org/91w99royp/forgescape1.png[/img]
Working Dungeoneering [img]http://s14.postimg.org/5wbnjk6ch/forgescape2.png[/img]
GWD and ALL Bosses [img]http://s14.postimg.org/tr4uhxc0x/forgescape3.png[/img]
Barrows [img]http://s14.postimg.org/a1mk5h44h/forgescape4.png[/img]
Custom Rise Of The Six [img]http://s14.postimg.org/c7guzz7kx/forgescape5.png[/img]

item.title: Forgescape 718+ Come check us!
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

OMG… My brain… Your server is a 718 and you think “718 items” are a feature??? :palm:

Also what does professional drop rates mean? Is it just like more suitable drop rates? It just sounds weird.

Read full topic

Hello! I am Forgescape’s new moderator Joku69. I wanna tell you something about our server Forgescape.

What is www.ForgeScape.com?

At ForgeScape our primary goal is to keep everything as realistic as possible.
We offer you an amazing gameplay that you won’t forget.
That includes that we have fixed many bugs dupes and glitches and if we find a new bug, we try our best to fix it as soon as possible.
You can enjoy the RuinNation feeling together with a perfect eco system.
Even the minor detail counts if you are coding a minigame or bosses, that’s why we offer you perfection!
